messages.subject: humidity and Cajun music (was introduction)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/19/01 8:35:27 AM, kscajuns@southwind.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/19/01 8:35:27 AM, kscajuns@... writes:

<< And I sure don't miss the humidity down there! People here in Kansas
actually complain when the humidity here gets to 40%!! Can you imagine?? >>

OH yes.
Eastern Kansas is like a swamp to me.
Western Kansas not so.

I think Louisiana would kill me. But I adore the music. It's not available
live in Albuquerque, but at least we don't have humidity! <g> I listened to
the BoneTones (Bontons, but I think they spelled it "in English" <g>) in
Minneapolis at the Minnesota State Fair for hours one day, turning down all
offers to see other parts of the fair. I wasn't leaving as long as they were
playing.

Sandra
